casebody.data:
No. 09-9780. Pierre Genevier, Petitioner v. Superior Court of California, Los Angeles County, et al. 559 U.S. 1090, 130 S. Ct. 2389,

176 L. Ed. 2d 765,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 3635. April 26, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of appeals of California, Second Appellate District, dismissed. See Rule 39.8. As the petitioner has repeatedly abused this Court’s process, the Clerk is directed not to accept any further petitions in noncriminal matters from petitioner unless the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) is paid and petition submitted in compliance with Rule 33.1. See Martin v. District of Columbia Court of Appeals, 506 U.S. 1, 113 S. Ct. 397, 121 L. Ed. 2d 305 (1992) (per curiam). Justice Stevens dissents. See id., at 4, 113 S. Ct. 397, 121 L. Ed. 2d 305, and cases cited therein.
